body:
Comment 1: 
We certainly don't want to add a field to the operand just for this. An Info.Objects map
would do.

That said, I am very tempted to remove most of the functionality in this file. types.New
is a convenience function for other tools, but Eval and EvalNode are difficult to use
correctly, don't quite do everything, and add complexity to the interface.
_Labels changed: added **repo-tools**._ _Owner changed to @griesemer._ _Status changed to **Thinking**._
